name: Elemental Evocation
text: The next Elemental you_play this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: It's just lighter fluid.

name: Flurry (Rank 1)
text: Freeze a random enemy minion. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Flurry, Flurrier, Flurriest.

name: Forbidden Flame
text: Spend all your Mana. Deal that much damage to a minion.
flavor: WARNING: This flame is not to be used unless you are a licensed acolyte of the Old Gods.

name: Freezing Potion
text: Freeze an enemy.
flavor: This is delicious! Oh no. BRAIN FREEEEEEEZE!

name: Hot Streak
text: Your next Fire spell this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: It's easy to catch fire when you're on fire.

name: Shifting Scroll
text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random Mage spell.
flavor: Next turn, this is going to be AMAZING.

name: Arcane Artificer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Armor equal to its_Cost.
flavor: Ethereal armor dissipates in 6 hours which can cause extreme awkwardness for first time buyers.

name: Arcane Blast
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. This spell gets double bonus from Spell Damage.
flavor: Now with 100% more blast!

name: Arcane Breath
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell.
flavor: One of many side effects from eating mana cookies.

name: Arcane Missiles
text: Deal $3 damage randomly split among all enemy characters.
flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

name: Arcane Missiles
text: Deal $3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

name: Babbling Book
text: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: His idol is the Green Hills of Stranglethorn, and he won't shut up about it.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Babbling Book
text: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: His idol is the Green Hills of Stranglethorn, and he won't shut up about it.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Mage.

name: Brain Freeze
text: Freeze a minion. Combo: Also deal $3 damage to it.
flavor: "The professor called on me, and I totally froze!"

name: Breath of Sindragosa
text: Deal $2 damage to a random enemy minion and Freeze it.
flavor: Is it cold in here or is it just Sindragosa?

name: Daring Fire-Eater
text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power this turn deals 2_more damage.
flavor: A few hours later he DESTROYED the arena bathrooms.

name: Devolving Missiles
text:
[x]Shoot three missiles
at random enemy minions
that transform them into
ones that cost (1) less.
flavor: Most intermural spell-dueling contests end with a field of wisps.

name: Elemental Allies
text: [x]Sidequest: Play an Elemental 2 turns in a row. Reward: Draw 3 spells from your deck.
flavor: Reno’s lucky he wasn’t caught by a fire elemental.

name: First Flame
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Add a Second Flame to your hand.
flavor: You never forget your first love: fire.

name: Font of Power
text: Discover a Mage minion. If your deck has no minions, keep all 3.
flavor: It's Comic Sans.

name: Glacier Racer
text: Spellburst: Deal 3 damage to all Frozen enemies.
flavor: It’s just not the same without a super suit.

name: Ice Lance
text: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal $4 damage instead.
flavor: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.

name: Ice Lance
text: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal $4 damage instead.
flavor: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.

name: Kabal Lackey
text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret\nyou play this turn costs (0).
flavor: I'll tell you one thing he doesn't lack: GUMPTION.

name: Lab Partner
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: "Professor, a gnome burned my homework!"

name: Learn Draconic
text: [x]Sidequest: Spend 8 Mana on spells. Reward: Summon a 6/6 Dragon.
flavor: Upon taking up the spellbook, Reno realized with a start: "I can't read."

name: Magic Trick
text: Discover a spell that costs (3) or less.
flavor: The world is not ready for an illusion of this depth and intricacy!

name: Mana Wyrm
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

name: Mana Wyrm
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

name: Mirror Image
text: Summon two 0/2 minions with Taunt.
flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

name: Mirror Image
text: Summon two 0/2 minions with Taunt.
flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

name: Open the Waygate
text: [x]Quest: Cast 8 spells that\ndidn't start in your deck.\nReward: Time Warp.
flavor: Although powerful, the incantation is simple. It’s just a jump to the left, and then a step to the right.

name: Primordial Studies
text: Discover a Spell Damage minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: A long forgotten tome whose very essence seeps of magic. 40 dust, used.

name: Raid the Sky Temple
text: Quest: Cast 10 spells.\nReward: Ascendant Scroll.
flavor: "Why can't I hold all these scrolls?"

name: Ray of Frost
text: Twinspell Freeze a minion. If it's already Frozen, deal $2 damage to it.
flavor: If you have zero chill, this can help.

name: Shooting Star
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
flavor: Literally starstruck.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Mage.

name: Shooting Star
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
flavor: Literally starstruck.

name: Snap Freeze
text: Freeze a minion.\nIf it's already Frozen, destroy it.
flavor: Lick the ice block. I triple-double-dog-dare-you.

name: Snap Freeze
text: Freeze a minion.\nIf it's already Frozen, destroy it.
flavor: Lick the ice block. I triple-double-dog-dare-you.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Mage.

name: Sorcerer's Gambit
text: Questline: Cast a Fire, Frost, and Arcane spell. Reward: Draw a spell.
flavor: After "the incident," the Stockades really had to reevaluate their anti-mage protocols.

name: Tome of Intellect
text: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: Just a compilation of napkins of intellect.
howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Violet Spellwing
text: Deathrattle: Add an 'Arcane Missiles' spell to_your hand.
flavor: A bird in the hand is worth three missiles in the grave.

name: Wand Thief
text: Combo: Discover a Mage_spell.
flavor: "What’re ya buyin’?”

name: Wildfire
text: [x]Increase the damage of\nyour Hero Power by 1.
flavor: The Barrens were a lush jungle. Then this happened.

name: Ancient Mysteries
text: Draw a Secret from your deck. It costs (0).
flavor: I'm not saying it was aliens, but it was TOTALLY aliens!

name: Apexis Smuggler
text: After you play a Secret, Discover a spell.
flavor: "S-secrets? I don't have any! Whoa, look, a spell!"

name: Arcane Explosion
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

name: Arcane Explosion
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

name: Arcane Flakmage
text: After you play a Secret, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Ancient pandaren proverb: He who is without secrets lacks flak.

name: Arcanologist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Secret.
flavor: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

name: Arcanologist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Secret.
flavor: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Mage.

name: Archmage Arugal
text: Whenever you draw a minion, add a copy of it to_your hand.
flavor: His worgen children call him Archmage AROO-OO-OO-OO-gal.

name: Astral Rift
text: Add 2 random minions to your hand.
flavor: Let's see what's behind rift number one!

name: Astromancer Solarian
text: [x]Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Solarian Prime' into your deck.
flavor: Loyal to Kael'thas Sunstrider, this blood elf mage sought arcane power in the Void. Did she find it... or did IT find her?

name: Book of Specters
text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any spells drawn.
flavor: Known throughout the land as the Spooky-nomicon.

name: Celestial Emissary
text: Battlecry: Your next spell_this turn has Spell_Damage +2.
flavor: Casting with the stars.

name: Celestial Ink Set
text:
[x]After you spend 5 Mana on
spells, reduce the cost of a
spell in your hand by (5).
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor:
"Dear Mother,
I have a lot of spells and burst in my hand. You should maybe run more armor and healing next time.
Cordially,
Your child"

name: Confection Cyclone
text: Battlecry: Add two 1/2 Sugar Elementals to your_hand.
flavor: "Oh, I thought it was a desert elemental?"

name: Conjure Mana Biscuit
text: Add a Biscuit to your hand that refreshes 2 Mana Crystals.
flavor: So THIS is why she was AFK.

name: Cram Session
text: Draw $1 |4(card, cards) (improved by Spell Damage).
flavor: The font of the arcane gives nearly limitless access to power and energy! But it can't keep you awake, for that we still use coffee.

name: Cult Sorcerer
text: [x]Spell Damage +1 After you cast a spell, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavor: No matter how many times we tell her not to, she keeps feeding C'Thun scraps under the table.

name: Evocation
text: Fill your hand with random Mage spells.\nAt the end of your turn, discard them.
flavor: You too could be the winner of the national spelling spree!

name: Fallen Hero
text: Your Hero Power deals 1_extra damage.
flavor: And he can't get up.

name: Fallen Hero
text: Your Hero Power deals 1_extra damage.
flavor: And he can't get up.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Mage.

name: Flame Geyser
text: Deal $2 damage.\nAdd a 1/2 Elemental to_your hand.
flavor: Oh, a wise geyser eh?

name: Flamecannon
text: Deal $4 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: Calling something a flamecannon really doesn't do much to distinguish it from other goblin devices.

name: Frostbolt
text: Deal $3 damage to a_character and Freeze it.
flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

name: Frostbolt
text: Deal $3 damage to a_character and Freeze it.
flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

name: Game Master
text: The first Secret you play each turn costs (1).
flavor: "You hear the mrgrgls of angry murlocs approaching. Roll initiative!"

name: Ice Walker
text: Your Hero Power also Freezes the target.
flavor: Ice Walker you say? He doesn't have feet!

name: Icicle
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it's Frozen, draw a card.
flavor: This may appear weak at frost glance, but it's actually a very ice spell.
howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Ignite
text: Deal $@ damage. Shuffle an Ignite into\nyour deck that deals\none more damage.
flavor: "So there I was in the Deadmines, I had VanCleef by the throat, and I was just about to let him have it when... <sniff> What's that smell?"

name: Khadgar
text: Your cards that summon minions summon twice_as_many.
flavor: "What do you call two minions summoned at once? Twinions, haha! Wait... where are you going?"

name: Lesser Ruby Spellstone
text: Add 1 random Mage spell to your hand. @(Play 2 Elementals to_upgrade.)
flavor:
The final stone undid its master
Spun into wards by nameless caster
Azari wailed a savage roar
Now sealed in nether, evermore.

name: Magic Dart Frog
text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: There's a powerful throat in this frog.

name: Mana Cyclone
text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell you've cast this turn, add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: It'll put a good spin on your spells.

name: Medivh's Valet
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 3 damage.
flavor: "Magus Medivh sir, I've brought the flaming balloons, as you requested."
howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Prestor's Pyromancer
text: Battlecry: Your next\nFire spell has Spell\nDamage +2.
flavor: Ah, yeah. This guy. Definitely not an evil dragon in disguise either.

name: Primordial Glyph
text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: It's the Ancient Tol'vir symbol for "Whoops!"

name: Pyros
text: Deathrattle: Return this to_your hand as a 6/6 that costs (6).
flavor: If you strike her down, she shall become more powerful than you can possibly… well, she'll become a 6/6 anyways.

name: Raven Familiar
text: Battlecry: Reveal a spell in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
flavor: Quoth the raven, 'Does yours cost more?'

name: Research Project
text: Each player draws 2_cards.
flavor: Abstract: Analyzing systemic applications of coldlight data sets vis-a-vis shuffle-related paradigms. Conclusion: Yay, cards!

name: Runed Orb
text: Deal $2 damage. Discover a spell.
flavor: The most dangerous Winter Veil ornament.

name: Shatter
text: Destroy a Frozen minion.
flavor: What's cooler than being cool?

name: Shimmering Tempest
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: HATES being summoned for Kirin Tor party lighting.

name: Snowchugger
text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor: Do the slow chant when he waddles by: "Chug! Chug! Chug!"

name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
text: Your spells cost (1) less.
flavor: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
text: Your spells cost (1) less.
flavor: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

name: Spirit of the Dragonhawk
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn.\nYour Hero Power also targets\n adjacent minions.
flavor: Dragonhawks aren’t known for their accuracy.

name: Starscryer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a spell.
flavor: Often grieves with the Starsweeper.

name: Trick Totem
text: At the end of your turn, cast a random spell that costs (3) or less.
flavor: It knows how to sit still and do tricks. Still working on rolling over, though.

name: Unstable Portal
text: Add a random minion to your hand. It costs (3) less.
flavor: The denizens of Azeroth have no idea how much work goes into stabilizing portals.  We spend like 30% of GDP on portal upkeep.

name: Arcane Amplifier
text: Your Hero Power deals 2_extra damage.
flavor: Not on good terms with warlocks.

name: Arcane Intellect
text: Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Mage.

name: Arcane Intellect
text: Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

name: Arcane Intellect
text: Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

name: Arcane Luminary
text: Cards that didn't start in your deck cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
flavor: They say true value is the cards you find along the way.

name: Black Cat
text: Spell Damage +1\n Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, draw a card.
flavor: She's so odd, you can't even.

name: Chenvaala
text: After you cast three spells in a turn, summon a 5/5_Elemental.
flavor: Like the Dragon Soul. If dragons had souls of ice.

name: Cinderstorm
text: Deal $5 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Forecast: "Cloudy with a chance of fireballs."

name: Coldwraith
text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, draw a card.
flavor: He's freezing his bones off!

name: Combustion
text: [x]Deal $4 damage to\na minion. Any excess\ndamages both neighbors.
flavor: Sally is friends with three Silverhand Recruits conveniently standing in a line. After casting this spell, how many friends does she have left? (Show your work.)

name: Cone of Cold
text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal $1 damage to them.
flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Mage.

name: Cone of Cold
text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal $1 damage to them.
flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

name: Conjurer's Calling
text: Twinspell\nDestroy a minion. Summon 2 minions of the same Cost to replace it.
flavor: If only you’d let it go to voicemail…

name: Counterspell
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Counterspell
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Counterspell
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Doomed Apprentice
text: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more.
flavor: Jaina was never good at keeping up apprentices.

name: Dune Sculptor
text: [x]After you cast a spell,\nadd a random Mage\nminion to your hand.
flavor: Come for the magic show, stay for the sand castles.

name: Duplicate
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, put 2 copies of it into your hand.
flavor: The one time when duping cards won't get your account banned!
howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Effigy
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a random minion with the same Cost.
flavor: Burning man, brah.

name: Explosive Runes
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $6 damage to it and any excess to their hero.
flavor: Sometimes it's safer NOT to read the warning signs.

name: Firebrand
text: Spellburst: Deal 4 damage randomly split among all_enemy minions.
flavor: Too cool for school, too hot for thought.

name: Flame Ward
text: Secret: After a minion attacks your hero, deal $3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Not to be confused with the burn ward.

name: Flamewaker
text: After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they don’t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Forgotten Torch
text: Deal $3 damage. Shuffle a 'Roaring Torch' into your deck that deals 6 damage.
flavor: Why does a forgotten torch turn into a roaring torch with no provocation?  It's one of life's many mysteries.
howToGet: Unlocked by starting the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Can be crafted after starting the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Frost Nova
text: Freeze all enemy minions.
flavor: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

name: Frost Nova
text: Freeze all enemy minions.
flavor: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

name: Frostweave Dungeoneer
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell. If it's a Frost spell, summon two 1/1 ___Elementals that Freeze.
flavor: It's a woven blanket of ice but surprisingly comforting.

name: Frozen Clone
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, add two copies of it to_your hand.
flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

name: Ice Barrier
text: [x]Secret: As soon as your\nhero is attacked, gain\n8 Armor.
flavor: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

name: Ice Barrier
text: Secret: When your\nhero is attacked,\ngain 8 Armor.
flavor: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

name: Ice Block
text: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
flavor: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

name: Ice Block
text: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
flavor: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

name: Imprisoned Observer
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Currently serving two turns on charges of aggravated minion slaughter.

name: Incanter's Flow
text: Reduce the Cost of spells in your deck by_(1).
flavor: "Gettin' them discounts in bulk amounts, spells can come, and spells can go, castin' costs drop with my sweet, sweet flow."

name: Kirin Tor Mage
text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret\nyou play this turn costs (0).
flavor: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

name: Kirin Tor Mage
text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret\nyou play this turn costs (0).
flavor: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

name: Mana Bind
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).
flavor: Nice spell.  YOINK!

name: Manic Soulcaster
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Shuffle a copy into your deck.
flavor: When casting a tournament, you really have to put your soul into it!

name: Messenger Raven
text: Battlecry: Discover a\nMage minion.
flavor: You can make a collect CAW!

name: Mirror Entity
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

name: Mirror Entity
text: [x]Secret: When your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

name: Mirror Entity
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Mage.

name: Netherwind Portal
text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a random\n4-Cost minion.
flavor: More aromatic than a regular portal.

name: Oasis Ally
text: [x]Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/6 Water Elemental.
flavor: As gentle as a bellyflop.

name: Polymorph: Boar
text: Transform a minion into a 4/2 Boar with Charge.
flavor: It's always Huffer.

name: Potion of Polymorph
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, transform it into a\n1/1 Sheep.
flavor: Tastes like Baaaaananas.

name: Pyromaniac
text: Whenever your Hero Power_kills a minion, draw a card.
flavor: She prefers “Flammably Inclined.”

name: Rigged Faire Game
text: Secret: If you didn't take any damage during your opponent's turn, draw 3 cards.
flavor: What's faire is fair.

name: Rimetongue
text: After you cast a Frost spell, summon a 1/1 Elemental that Freezes.
flavor:
Warriors are red,
Frost spells are blue,
If you're being hit by a weapon,
Rimetongue's got you.

name: Shattering Blast
text: Destroy all Frozen minions.
flavor: Let's be honest, they weren't going to unfreeze anyway.

name: Simulacrum
text: Copy the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

name: Soot Spewer
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: The inventor of the goblin shredder is involved in several patent disputes with the inventor of the soot spewer.

name: Spellbender
text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
flavor: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

name: Spellbender
text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
flavor: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

name: Spellslinger
text: Battlecry: Add a random spell to each player's hand.
flavor: Does he sling spells, or do his spells linger about.  Who can say?

name: Splitting Image
text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a copy of it.
flavor: Sometimes you get punched so hard they see double.

name: Stargazer Luna
text: After you play the\nright-most card in your hand, draw a card.
flavor: She's Dr. Boom's right-hand mage.

name: Twilight Flamecaller
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Make sure you summon a Twilight Marshmallowcaller too! Mmmm Mmm Mmm!!

name: Unexpected Results
text: [x]Summon two random\n$2-Cost minions (improved\nby Spell Damage).
flavor: Sometimes science is more art than science. A lot of people don’t get that.

name: Vaporize
text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
flavor: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

name: Vaporize
text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
flavor: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

name: Volcanic Potion
text: Deal $2 damage to all_minions.
flavor: The secret ingredient in Kazakus's award-winning chili recipe.

name: Animated Armor
text: Your hero can only take 1 damage at a time.
flavor: Try putting it on.  Wait, let me get my camera.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Arcane Keysmith
text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret. Put it into the battlefield.
flavor: She sells all manner of keys: from A flat to G sharp.

name: Azure Explorer
text: Spell Damage +2\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor: Has an appetite for knowledge!

name: Cone of Cold
text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal $1 damage to them.
flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

name: Cosmic Anomaly
text: Spell Damage +2
flavor: INGREDIENTS: STAR-STUFF, \nBLUE #1, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS.

name: Dalaran Aspirant
text: Inspire: Gain Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Is he aspiring or inspiring?  Make up your mind!

name: Deck of Lunacy
text: Transform spells in your deck into ones that cost (3) more. (They keep their original Cost.)
flavor: Voted "Most Lunacy" in Madness Monthly magazine.

name: Demented Frostcaller
text: After you cast a spell, Freeze a random enemy.
flavor: He prefers that you refer to him by his nickname: 'Frostwaker.'

name: Echo of Medivh
text: Put a copy of each friendly minion into your hand.
flavor: Medivh's echo haunts Karazhan, eternally cheating at chess and Hearthstone.

name: Ethereal Arcanist
text: If you control a Secret at_the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
flavor: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

name: Ethereal Arcanist
text: If you control a Secret at_the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
flavor: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

name: Fire Sale
text: Tradeable\nDeal $3 damage\nto all minions.
flavor: Everything is 50% off now that our warehouse burned down.

name: Fireball
text: Deal $6 damage.
flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Mage.

name: Fireball
text: Deal $6 damage.
flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

name: Fireball
text: Deal $6 damage.
flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

name: Ghastly Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Add a 'Mirror Image' spell to your hand.
flavor: Wearing purple after the holidays? GHASTLY!

name: Goblin Blastmage
text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: If you can't find a bomb to throw, just pick up any goblin invention and throw that.

name: Kirin Tor Tricaster
text: Spell Damage +3\nYour spells cost (1) more.
flavor: The math checks out!

name: Leyline Manipulator
text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards that didn't start in your deck, reduce their Cost by (2).
flavor: The shortest distance between two points is a leyline.

name: Molten Reflection
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.
flavor: Dang, I'm looking pretty hot!

name: Occult Conjurer
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon a copy of_this.
flavor: Like mirror image, but more secretive and angsty.

name: Polymorph
text: Transform a minion\ninto a 1/1 Sheep.
flavor: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

name: Polymorph
text: Transform a minion\ninto a 1/1 Sheep.
flavor: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

name: Potion of Illusion
text: Add 1/1 copies of your minions to your hand. They cost (1).
flavor: Unfortunately, there's no potion that can make you unsee all the faces in that bottle.

name: Reckless Apprentice
text: Battlecry: Fire your Hero Power at all enemies.
flavor: It’s all a great learning experience until someone accidentally aggros the boss.

name: Ring Toss
text: Discover a Secret and cast it. Corrupt: Discover 2 instead.
flavor: If you liked it, then you shoulda put a ring on it!

name: Scorch
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a
minion. Costs (1) if you
played an Elemental
last turn.
flavor: The hoof.\nThe hoof.\nThe hoof is on fire.

name: Steam Surger
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, add a 'Flame Geyser' to your hand.
flavor: Explorers nicknamed him the Teapot Elemental.

name: Varden Dawngrasp
text: [x]Battlecry: Freeze all enemy minions. If any are already Frozen, deal 4 damage to them instead.
flavor: Varden Dawngrasp could wield fire, summon hailstorms, and morph a night elf into a sheep with a snap of their fingers. Knowing how malleable reality could be, certain labels felt downright trivial.

name: Vex Crow
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random\n2-Cost minion.
flavor: As birds of ill omen, these crows often summon Doomsayers.

name: Water Elemental
text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor: Don't summon a water elemental at a party.  It'll dampen the mood.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Mage.

name: Water Elemental
text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor: Don't summon a water elemental at a party.  It'll dampen the mood.

name: Water Elemental
text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor: Don't summon a water elemental at a party.  It'll dampen the mood.

name: Wee Spellstopper
text: Adjacent minions can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor: Bane of spellcasters and spelling bees everywhere.

name: Wyrm Weaver
text: Spellburst: Summon two 1/2 Mana Wyrms.
flavor: Studied basket weaving as an undergrad.

name: Aegwynn, the Guardian
text: Spell Damage +2\nDeathrattle: The next minion_you draw inherits these powers.
flavor: With Medivh as her son, nothing YOU do could ever disappoint her.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 500 games as Mage.

name: Apexis Blast
text: Deal $5 damage.\nIf your deck has no minions, summon a random 5-Cost minion.
flavor: Lonely mages can still have a blast!

name: Blast Wave
text: Deal $2 damage to_all minions.\nOverkill: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: If you’re burning and you know it, wave your hands!

name: Bonfire Elemental
text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, draw a card.
flavor: Next step: Marshmallow elementals.

name: Cabalist's Tome
text: Add 3 random Mage spells to your hand.
flavor: What's in there? I bet it's cookie recipes!

name: Cloud Prince
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 6 damage.
flavor: "In West Cloudidelphia, born and raised; flinging lightning for the rest of my days."

name: Cryomancer
text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, gain +2/+2.
flavor: She loves Frozen. I mean who doesn't?

name: Curio Collector
text: Whenever you draw a card, gain +1/+1.
flavor: Experts worry that curios are a gateway to face-collecting.

name: Deck of Wonders
text: Shuffle 5 Scrolls into your deck. When drawn, cast a random spell.
flavor: "Pick a card, any card. Wait! No! Not that one!" - Last words of previous owner

name: Dragon's Breath
text: Deal $4 damage. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
flavor: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy?  It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Dragon's Fury
text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all_minions.
flavor: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

name: Ethereal Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: Despite the name, he's a solid conjurer.
howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Ethereal Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: Despite the name, he's a solid conjurer.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Mage.

name: Firework Elemental
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage\nto a minion. Corrupt:\nDeal 12 instead.
flavor: The brightest spark can still go dark.

name: Flame Lance
text: Deal $8 damage to a minion.
flavor: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

name: Malygos, Aspect of Magic
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, Discover an\n upgraded Mage spell.
flavor: It's official. We can say Malygeese.

name: Mozaki, Master Duelist
text: After you cast a spell, gain Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Treats her students like her peers, which means defeating them in one-sided duels all day long.

name: Naga Sand Witch
text: [x]Battlecry: Change the Cost\nof spells in your hand to (5).
flavor: 5 mana footlong, anyone?

name: Ras Frostwhisper
text: At the end of your turn,\ndeal $1 damage to all enemies (improved by Spell Damage).
flavor: Always the favorite of Headmaster Kel'Thuzad, Ras nonetheless received a chilly reception from the other faculty.

name: Refreshing Spring Water
text: Draw 2 cards.\nRefresh 2 Mana Crystals for each spell drawn.
flavor: "Mana" is just another name for "electrolytes."

name: Rolling Fireball
text: Deal $8 damage to a minion. Any excess damage continues to\nthe left or right.
flavor: Why don't they ever run perpendicular?

name: Sanctum Chandler
text: After you cast a Fire spell, draw a spell.
flavor: Has been burning at both ends to keep the place illuminated.

name: Servant of Yogg-Saron
text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell that costs (5) or less (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Yogg-Saron always likes to complain about how he has too many servants and there are too many mouths to feed.

name: Aluneth
text: At the end of your turn, draw 3 cards.
flavor: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWER…itty bitty living space.

name: Arcanosaur
text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, deal_3_damage_to_all other minions.
flavor: Arcane energy… finds a way.

name: Blizzard
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

name: Blizzard
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

name: Coldarra Drake
text: You can use your Hero Power any number of times.
flavor: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.

name: Coldarra Drake
text: You can use your Hero Power any number of times.
flavor: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Mage.

name: Dragoncaster
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, your next spell this turn costs (0).
flavor: It’s challenging to perform magic on dragonback. It’s so easy to drop the rabbit.

name: Faceless Summoner
text: Battlecry: Summon a random 3-Cost minion.
flavor: They never get the recognition they deserve.

name: Floecaster
text: Costs (2) less for each Frozen enemy.
flavor: His real name is Melvin, but he prefers his friends call him ... <sigh> ..."Floecaster."

name: Jandice Barov
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two random 5-Cost minions. Secretly pick one that dies _when it takes damage.
flavor: Her parents own Scholomance. Of course she's going to play tricks on the students!

name: Kabal Crystal Runner
text: Costs (2) less for each Secret you've played this_game.
flavor: "Listen, I can cut you in on a little of this premium mana, but you can't tell my boss."

name: Meteor
text: Deal $15 damage to a minion and $3 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor: When you absolutely, positively have to kill all the dinosaurs.

name: Meteorologist
text: Battlecry: For each card in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: Some say the world will end in fire. Some say in ice. Why not BOTH?

name: Reno the Relicologist
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavor: All his life, Reno Jackson was only a gatling wand away from becoming the greatest and most terrifying mage who ever existed.

name: Sayge, Seer of Darkmoon
text: Battlecry: Draw @ |4(card, cards). (Upgraded for each friendly Secret that has triggered this game!)
flavor: There are no secrets between us... or refunds.

name: Toki, Time-Tinker
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random\nLegendary minion from\nthe past to your hand.
flavor: Just a twist to the left, one quarter turn to the right and … oops! Well, we didn’t need that timeline anyway.

name: Animated Avalanche
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played\nan Elemental last turn,\nsummon a copy of this.
flavor: Always sliding down mountains because it can't stop talking with its hands.

name: Archmage Antonidas
text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to_your hand.
flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

name: Archmage Antonidas
text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to_your hand.
flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

name: Astromancer
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a\nrandom minion with Cost\nequal to your hand size.
flavor: All signs point to Antonidas.

name: Clumsy Courier
text: Battlecry: Cast the highest Cost spell from your hand.
flavor: Not the nacho cheese!

name: Firelands Portal
text: Deal $5 damage. Summon a random\n5-Cost minion.
flavor: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"
howToGet: Unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Flame Leviathan
text: When you draw this, deal 2 damage to all characters.
flavor: Mimiron likes to take the Flame Leviathan out on some sweet joyrides.

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal $5 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Mage.

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal $4 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal $5 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Greater Arcane Missiles
text: Shoot three missiles at random enemies that deal $3 damage each.
flavor: Wow, and I thought Arcane Missiles was great!

name: Inkmaster Solia
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, the next spell you cast this turn costs (0).
flavor: Solia marks the Kabal with intricate tattoos that grant immense power. Also it makes it harder for other gangs to recruit from their numbers. BACK OFF, GOONS.

name: Jan'alai, the Dragonhawk
text: [x]Battlecry: If your Hero Power dealt 8 damage this game, summon Ragnaros the Firelord.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: You mess with the Bird, you get the Firelord.

name: Luna's Pocket Galaxy
text: Change the Cost of minions in your\ndeck to (1).
flavor: Luna became head of the astronomy department when her boss invented the Pocket Black Hole.

name: Mask of C'Thun
text: Deal $10 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Hide in the mask, but it will wear you. Through its gleaming eye, you shall see true.

name: Anomalus
text: Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage to all minions.
flavor: That's short for "Anomnomnomnomalus".

name: Deep Freeze
text: Freeze an enemy. Summon two 3/6 Water Elementals.
flavor: "Dancing with the Satyrs… on Ice!"

name: Glacial Mysteries
text: Put one of each Secret from your deck into\nthe battlefield.
flavor: The secret is in the frosting.

name: Grand Finale
text: Summon an 8/8 Elemental. Repeat for each Elemental you played last turn.
flavor: Considering all the other hazards at Darkmoon, overindulgent pyrotechnics seem downright pedestrian.

name: Grand Magus Antonidas
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a Fire spell on each of your last three turns, cast 3 Fireballs at ___random enemies.@ (@/3)
flavor: He's really disappointed Jaina became a frost mage.

name: Hex Lord Malacrass
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of your opening hand to your hand (except this card).
flavor: Extremely awkward cousin of Hex Lord Malaclass.

name: Mana Giant
text:
[x]Costs (1) less for each
card you've played this
game that didn't start
in your deck.
flavor: Spell more and save more with a GIANT discount!

name: Mordresh Fire Eye
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've dealt 10 damage with your Hero Power this game, deal 10 damage to all enemies.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: You're not hardcore unless you died hardcore.

name: Power of Creation
text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon two copies of it.
flavor: Mostly used for party tricks, to be honest.

name: Rhonin
text: Deathrattle: Add 3 copies of Arcane Missiles to your hand.
flavor: A masterless shamurai.

name: Sindragosa
text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/1 Frozen Champions.
flavor: "I recognize your effort but I think your magic still has room for improvement." - Sindragosa after taking a class on giving constructive feedback.

name: Tortollan Pilgrim
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell\nin your deck and cast it\nwith random targets.
flavor: A tortollan made it to the desert!

name: Dragoncaller Alanna
text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Dragon for each spell you cast this game that costs (5) or more.
flavor: Her secret is using a gentle voice and carrying a baggie of hotdogs.

name: Frost Lich Jaina
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 3/6 Water Elemental. Your Elementals have Lifesteal this game.
flavor: "Arthas was a spoiled child, playing with toys he could neither control nor understand. Come into the cold. I will show you the true power of the Frozen Throne."

name: Kalecgos
text: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

name: Puzzle Box of Yogg-Saron
text: Cast 10 random spells (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: "PUT THE BOX DOWN, RENO!"

name: Pyroblast
text: Deal $10 damage.
flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

name: Pyroblast
text: Deal $10 damage.
flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

name: The Amazing Reno
text: Battlecry: Make all minions disappear. *Poof!*
flavor: "Reno!" "Please address me by my proper title." " Amazing Reno..."
